thread.title: The WFNZ Coca Cola Doghouse Tailgate Party: Indianapolis v Carolina
thread.title_full: The WFNZ Coca Cola Doghouse Tailgate Party: Indianapolis v Carolina

title: The WFNZ Coca Cola Doghouse Tailgate Party: Indianapolis v Carolina
text:
5:00 p.m. Monday, Nov. 2, 2015 Categories 
Events, Nightlife | Singles, Sports We’ve got a hot spot. Join us for the best FREE and open to the public Pre and Post tailgate party in town! Located at the corner of Mint and Morehead, in the shadow of Bank of America Stadium, the WFNZ Doghouse is the home of the greatest tailgate party in Charlotte before each Carolina Panthers home game, plus the big college tourney and Belk Bowl! We roll up the doors providing restaurant choices, a fully-staffed bar, indoor seating, live music on an outdoor stage, activities, a live WFNZ broadcast and loads of flat-screen TVs with sports programming, all in the path of the stadium. It’s a meeting place for Panthers fans to get ready for the day’s game. Admission to the WFNZ Doghouse is free! It’s a football tailgate party like no other! DOORS OPEN AT 5 Related
